trans-unit.source: Represents a group of controls on a Ribbon tab.
trans-unit.target: 表示功能区选项卡上的一组控件。

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup> object when you drag a **Group** control from the **Office Ribbon Controls** tab of the **Toolbox** onto the Ribbon Designer.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 将创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup>对象拖动时**组**控件从**Office 功能区控件**选项卡**工具箱**拖动到功能区设计器。

trans-unit.source: Common Tasks
trans-unit.target: 常规任务

trans-unit.source: The following table lists members that are useful for common tasks.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用于常见任务的成员。

trans-unit.source: All of these tasks can be performed at design time.
trans-unit.target: 可以在设计时执行所有这些任务。

trans-unit.source: Some of these tasks can be performed at run time before the Ribbon is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 可以在运行时加载功能区之前执行其中的一些任务。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Task
trans-unit.target: 任务

trans-unit.source: Member
trans-unit.target: 成员

trans-unit.source: Access the controls in the group, add controls to the group, or remove controls from the group.
trans-unit.target: 访问组中的控件、 将控件添加到组，或从组中删除控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.Items%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Add a group to a Ribbon tab.
trans-unit.target: 将组添加到功能区选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Add a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup> to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonTab.Groups%2A> collection of the tab.
trans-unit.target: 添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup>到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonTab.Groups%2A>选项卡的集合。

trans-unit.source: Specify the location of a group on a built-in tab, relative to the location of a built-in group.
trans-unit.target: 在内置选项卡上，相对于内置组的位置指定组的位置。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.Position%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.Position%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: You can create a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup> at run time by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory.CreateRibbonGroup%2A> method of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup>通过使用在运行时<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory.CreateRibbonGroup%2A>方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory>对象。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to access the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory> object:
trans-unit.target: 可通过两种方法来访问 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory> 对象：

trans-unit.source: By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。

trans-unit.source: Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。

trans-unit.source: Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Ribbon dialog launcher that is associated with the group.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与组关联的功能区对话启动程序。

trans-unit.source: The Ribbon dialog launcher that is associated with the group.
trans-unit.target: 与组关联的功能区对话启动程序。

trans-unit.source: The Ribbon dialog launcher is a small icon that appears in the group.
trans-unit.target: 功能区对话框启动器是组中将显示一个小图标。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks this icon, you can handle the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.DialogLauncherClick> event to open a custom dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击此图标时，你可以处理<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.DialogLauncherClick>事件以打开自定义对话框。

trans-unit.source: By default, groups do not have a Ribbon dialog launcher.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，组不具有功能区对话框启动器。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add a Dialog Box Launcher to a Ribbon Group](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 向功能区组添加对话框启动器](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can customize the behavior of the Ribbon dialog launcher by using properties of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher> interface.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用属性的自定义功能区对话框启动器的行为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher>接口。

trans-unit.source: For example, to set the screen tip that appears when the user moves the pointer over the dialog launcher icon, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher.ScreenTip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要设置当用户将指针移到对话框启动器图标上方时显示的屏幕提示，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher.ScreenTip%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Some properties of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher> interface, such as the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher.Image%2A> property, are only applicable when the end user adds it to the Quick Access Toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 某些属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher>接口，如<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher.Image%2A>属性时，仅适用时最终用户将其添加到快速访问工具栏。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher.KeyTip%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher.ScreenTip%2A> properties on the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher> that is added to the default group.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher.KeyTip%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher.ScreenTip%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher>，它将添加到默认组。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：

trans-unit.source: Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project.
trans-unit.target: 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）**项到 Office 项目。

trans-unit.source: Add a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher> to the default group `Group1` as outlined in [How to: Add a Dialog Box Launcher to a Ribbon Group](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group.md).
trans-unit.target: 添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher>到默认组`Group1`中所述[如何： 向功能区组添加对话框启动器](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the Ribbon dialog launcher icon in the group.
trans-unit.target: 在用户单击组中的功能区对话启动程序时发生。

trans-unit.source: The Ribbon dialog launcher is a small icon that appears in the group.
trans-unit.target: 功能区对话框启动器是组中将显示一个小图标。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks this icon, you can handle the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.DialogLauncherClick> event to open a custom dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击此图标时，你可以处理<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.DialogLauncherClick>事件以打开自定义对话框。

trans-unit.source: By default, groups do not have a Ribbon dialog launcher.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，组不具有功能区对话框启动器。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add a Dialog Box Launcher to a Ribbon Group](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 向功能区组添加对话框启动器](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add a dialog box launcher to a ribbon group and how to launch a custom dialog that enables users to choose advanced settings when they click on the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher> icon in the lower right corner of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何向功能区组添加对话框启动器以及如何启动使用户可以选择高级的设置，当他们单击在上一个自定义对话框<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher>的右下角中的图标<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup>。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：

trans-unit.source: Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project.
trans-unit.target: 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）**项到 Office 项目。

trans-unit.source: Add a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher> to the default group as outlined in [How to: Add a Dialog Box Launcher to a Ribbon Group](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group.md).
trans-unit.target: 添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDialogLauncher>到默认组中所述[如何： 向功能区组添加对话框启动器](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you are using Visual Basic, add a new Windows Form **Dialog** item to the project.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用的 Visual Basic，添加一个新的 Windows 窗体**对话框**到项目的项。

trans-unit.source: If you are using C#, add a new **Windows Form** item and turn it into a dialog by adding an **OK** and **Cancel** button to the form and creating event handlers for the buttons' click events.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用的 C#，添加新**Windows 窗体**项，然后将其转换为一个对话框，通过添加**确定**和**取消**到窗体按钮和创建为按钮的单击事件处理程序事件。

trans-unit.source: Set the **(Name)** property of the dialog to `advancedSettingsDialog`.
trans-unit.target: 设置**（名称）**属性到对话框`advancedSettingsDialog`。

trans-unit.source: You can customize the dialog by adding controls and setting more properties.
trans-unit.target: 通过添加控件并设置更多属性，可以自定义对话框。

trans-unit.source: Add the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.DialogLauncherClick> event handler to your code.
trans-unit.target: 添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.DialogLauncherClick>到你的代码的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Place the contents of the following method into the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.DialogLauncherClick> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 将以下方法到的内容放<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.DialogLauncherClick>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that identifies the current group.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个标识当前组的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string that identifies the current group.
trans-unit.target: 一个标识当前组的字符串。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.Id%2A> property has the same value as the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.Id%2A>属性具有相同的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Name%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If no value is specified for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Name%2A> property, then Visual Studio generates a value for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.Id%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果为不指定任何值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Name%2A>属性，则 Visual Studio 生成的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.Id%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: All components in an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon> object must have unique `Id` property values.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有组件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon>对象必须具有唯一`Id`属性值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.Id%2A> property corresponds to the `id` attribute of components in the Ribbon XML file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.Id%2A>属性对应于`id`功能区 XML 文件中的组件的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the controls in the group.
trans-unit.target: 获取组中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The collection of controls in the group.
trans-unit.target: 组中控件的集合。

trans-unit.source: You can add a Ribbon control to a group at run time, but only before the Ribbon is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时，但只能在加载功能区之前，你可以将功能区控件添加到组。

trans-unit.source: Create an instance of the control, and then add the new control to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 创建该控件的实例，然后添加到新的控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: When you add controls to a group by using the Ribbon Designer, Visual Studio automatically adds the controls to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.Items%2A> property of the group.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用功能区设计器可将控件添加到组中，在 Visual Studio 会自动添加到控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.Items%2A>组的属性。

trans-unit.source: You try to add, remove, or replace a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl" /> after the Ribbon is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 加载功能区后，尝试添加、移除或替换 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut of the group.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置组的键盘快捷键。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the keyboard shortcut of the group.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示该组的键盘快捷键的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A KeyTip must have from 1 to 3 characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters.
trans-unit.target: 快捷键提示必须包含 1 到 3 个字符，并且必须包含空格、 制表符或换行字符。

trans-unit.source: KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls.
trans-unit.target: 键提示有时也称为访问密钥或快捷键，可用作激活控件的快捷组合键。

trans-unit.source: KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key.
trans-unit.target: 当你按下 ALT 键时，键提示将显示在功能区上。

trans-unit.source: If your KeyTip conflicts with KeyTips for built-in controls or from other add-ins, Microsoft Office might assign non-conflicting KeyTip values automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果内置控件或从其他加载项，则与键提示中你快捷键提示相冲突，Microsoft Office 可能自动分配不冲突快捷键提示值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Use the keyboard to work with Ribbon programs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用键盘来使用功能区程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed by the label of the group.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置组标签所显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text that is displayed by the label of the group.
trans-unit.target: 通过组标签显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The label appears at the bottom of the group.
trans-unit.target: 组的底部将显示标签。

trans-unit.source: The label should be a brief phrase that describes the collective functionality of the controls on the group.
trans-unit.target: 标签应简短说明组上的控件的共同功能。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of a group on a built-in tab, relative to a built-in group on the tab.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置内置选项卡上的组的位置（相对于选项卡上的内置组）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" /> that represents the position of the group, relative to a built-in group on the tab.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" />，表示组的位置（相对于选项卡上的内置组）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.Position%2A> property has an effect only if the group is on a built-in tab. For more information, see [How to: Customize a Built-in Tab](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-customize-a-built-in-tab.md).
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.Position%2A>属性仅当组已在内置选项卡上才起作用。有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 自定义内置选项卡](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-customize-a-built-in-tab.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.Position%2A> property can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.Position%2A>只能在加载功能区之前，可以设置属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the group is visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示组是否可见。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the group is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果组可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。
